official_title: To define marriage for all legal purposes in the District of Columbia to consist of the union of one man and one woman.

summary.text: Defines "marriage" for all legal purposes in the District of Columbia to mean the union of one man and one woman.

titles.title: To define marriage for all legal purposes in the District of Columbia to consist of the union of one man and one woman.
